hero.description: I'm a freelance designer-developer with deep expertise in digital craft. When projects call for it, I collaborate with a curated network of specialists—copywriters, brand strategists, and content creators— ensuring you get comprehensive solutions without the agency overhead.

story.title: Our Approach
paragraphs: Haelo Studios was born from a simple belief: premium brands deserve premium digital experiences without the complexity and cost of traditional agencies. I lead every project personally, handling design and development directly—no middlemen, no account managers, just direct collaboration.

Over the years, I've built relationships with exceptional freelance specialists. When a project needs compelling copy, strategic branding, or professional photography, I bring in trusted collaborators. This flexible model means you get agency-level results with freelance efficiency and personal attention.

Working with select clients means each project gets the focus it deserves. I partner with ambitious brands who value quality, understand the power of thoughtful design, and appreciate the benefits of working directly with an experienced professional backed by a reliable creative network.

founder.name: Bryanna Gardner
founder.title: Founder & Lead Engineer
bio: With over 8 years of experience in digital design and engineering, I've had the privilege of working with brands across industries—from startups finding their voice to established companies reimagining their digital presence.

My approach combines strategic thinking with hands-on craft. I believe the best digital experiences come from understanding both the business goals and the user needs, then translating that into elegant, functional design backed by solid engineering.

When projects require specialized skills like copywriting, videography, or photography, I bring in trusted collaborators I've worked with for years. This gives you the comprehensive solutions you need while maintaining the efficiency and personal attention of working with a freelancer.

header.title: What We Stand For
header.description: Our values guide every project, every interaction, every line of code.

items.title: Craft Over Speed
items.description: We believe in taking the time to do things right. Every pixel, every line of code matters.

items.title: Strategic Thinking
items.description: Beautiful design means nothing without purpose. We align every decision with your business goals.

items.title: Technical Excellence
items.description: Clean, maintainable code that scales. We build for today and tomorrow.

items.title: Partnership Approach
items.description: Your success is our success. We're not just vendors—we're collaborators in your vision.

cta.description: If you're a brand that values quality over quantity and believes in the power of exceptional design, let's talk.
